SELECT ic.comment_level commentLevel, ic.content content, ic.spec_name specName, ic.created_time createdTime, u.face userFace, u.nickname nickname FROM items_comments ic LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = ic.user_id WHERE ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
AND ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

SELECT i.id as itemId, i.item_name itemName, i.sell_counts sellCounts, tempSpec.price_discount `price`, ii.url imgUrl FROM items i LEFT JOIN items_img ii ON i.id = ii.item_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT item_id,MIN(price_discount) price_discount FROM items_spec GROUP BY item_id ) tempSpec ON i.id = tempSpec.item_id WHERE ii.is_main = 1
AND i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.keywords}%'
order by
i.sell_counts desc
tempSpec.price_discount asc
i.item_name asc
